data.claim: 2026 Color Trends: Pantone Color of Year is Cloud Dancer (11-4201) - soft airy white for clarity/calm. Key palettes: 1) Electric Bioluminescence (acid green, cyan, hyper-violet). 2) Deep Teal/Blue-greens (aegean, kelp). 3) Unbleached naturals (bone white, limestone). 4) Decadent chocolate (espresso, cacao). 5) Synthesized mint (dusty mint, clinical green). 6) Burnished amber (honey, ochre). 7) Deeper reds (merlot, rust). 8) Liquid chrome (silver, mercury). Dark mode uses deep brand colors, not pure black. Gradients are mesh/ambient, not rainbow.
